metadata.dc:author: Andía, V
Meza Mendoza, S C
Salmerón de Diego, J
Gallego Quintans, J R
Arranz, A
Jara Albarrán, A
metadata.dc:description: The case is presented of an 18 year old female patient who was diagnosed at the age of 2 of Xeroderma pigmentosum (XP), and that at the age of 17 presented amenorrhea and hirsutism with 18 months evolution, and diagnosed of polycystic ovaries (PCO). The possible causes of this rare association which has not been previously described are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Xeroderma pigmentoso y ovarios poliquísticos. Una asociación no descrita. A proposito de un caso.
[Xeroderma pigmentosum and polycystic ovaries. An association not previously described. A case report].
